alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Hardin; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 10:12PM EDT until July 29 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Harrison County in south central Indiana... Crawford County in south central Indiana... Perry County in south central Indiana... Meade County in central Kentucky... Northwestern Hardin County in central Kentucky... Breckinridge County in central Kentucky... * Until 1100 PM EDT/1000 PM CDT/. * At 1012 PM EDT/912 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Jasper to 11 miles northeast of Tell City to 6 miles east of Hawesville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Corydon, Brandenburg, Hardinsburg, English, Carefree Town, Mount Pleasant, Webster, Irvington, Cloverport and Milltown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
